section.p: If you have the codeword Evict, immediately. If not, read on.

You are threading your way through the swamp, along a narrow, well-trodden path, when a stooped old woman with a cane steps out in front of you. She is horribly ugly, so ugly, in fact, that she looks like a large, fat toad.
'Well met, traveller,' she croaks. She warns you that the path is treacherous and offers to guide you safely through the swamp.
'Follow me, an' I'll see you safe, in return for a Shard or two,' she rasps.
